# Angela Lawson

### Ward V

**303.739.7518** (council office)  
**720.244.6932** (other)  
**Email:** [alawson@auroragov.org](mailto:alawson@auroragov.org)  
**Term Expires:** November 2027

**Council Policy Committees (2025):** Chair, Federal, State &amp; Intergovernmental Relations; Vice Chair, Housing, Neighborhood Services &amp; Redevelopment; Member, Transportation, Airports &amp; Public Works.

**Community/Intergovernmental (2024):** Member, National League of Cities, Community &amp; Economic Development Committee; Member, Aurora History and Historic Sites Collections Committee; Member, ADCOG Transportation Committee; Member, Aurora Economic Development Council; Member, Parker Road Corridor Improvements Policy Advisory Committee (PAC),  Former Executive Board Member, Colorado Municipal League; Member, Colorado Municipal League Policy Committee; Member, Alameda Avenue Study Steering Committee; Member, DRCOG, Finance and Budget Committee; Former member, Reimagine RTD Advisory Committee
